attributes.action: Demand our money back for track and trace. If proved Unfit for purpose
attributes.additional_details: It has been a travesty of a program. I have not heard a single good thing about the development and roll out. When I had Covid 19 I had one phone call from a guy who clearly wasn’t bothered and I’ve heard many similar stories
attributes.background:
If any product is unfit for purpose after costing so much we should be able to have a refund. 

Surely there’s some recourse we can take against the developers.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about money spent on the NHS Test and Trace programme, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
